items.sentence: You ought not to say such things in public.
We did our best, but it wasn't good enough.
Tom isn't Mary's husband. He's her brother.
Everyone but me seemed to know where to go.
That question naturally invited discussion.
This photograph reminds me of my childhood.
The school is only a five-minute walk away.
Don't get a stomachache by eating too much.
The dog Tom trained was a really smart dog.
Tom walks his dog every day, rain or shine.
Tom has to pay attention to what Mary says.
Tom has to help even if he doesn't want to.
I know that lots of people want to do that.
I don't want to be on the same team as you.
Do you want the top bunk or the bottom one?
You haven't learned to drive yet, have you?
How many years have you been studying judo?
I had no idea you knew how to play mahjong.
I read about how to make tempura in a book.
Tom killed the chicken, and Mary cooked it.
Tom knew something had gone horribly wrong.
I've been doing that for about three years.
I've been doing that for about three weeks.
I've asked Tom to show Mary how to do that.
I was able to get to Boston in three hours.
Just make sure you get this done by Monday.
Tom is your older daughter's son, isn't he?
Tom is quite a bit older than me, isn't he?
All three of my brothers are older than me.
My brother who lives in Boston is a doctor.
Tom has hated dogs and cats his whole life.
We believe that Tom and Mary were murdered.
I have to be at work at a quarter to eight.
What does it cost to run a washing machine?
How many hours have you been sitting there?
Tom said French wasn't his native language.
Tom needs to know this as soon as possible.
Tom needs to know that we know what he did.
If you don't mind, I'd like to go with you.
Tom always does his homework before supper.
There is still a little milk in the bottle.
Tom could've asked someone else to do that.
I feel the same way that you do about this.
I think that we should consider doing that.
I want Tom to do the same thing that I did.
I think that they'll permit you to do that.
It's been three years since Tom's accident.
I shouldn't have been permitted to do that.
It was the worst pain I'd ever experienced.
Tom invested his money in the stock market.
